column2: Marathon Oil Corp. engages in the exploration, production, and marketing of liquid hydrocarbons and natural gas. The company is headquartered in Houston, Texas and currently employs 2,400 full-time employees. The firm operates through two segments: United States E&P and International E&P. The United States E&P segment explores for, produces and markets crude oil and condensate, natural gas liquids (NGLs) and natural gas in the United States. The International E&P segment explores for, produces and markets crude oil and condensate, NGLs and natural gas outside of the United States, and produces and markets products manufactured from natural gas, such as liquefied natural gas (LNG) and methanol, in Equatorial Guinea (E.G. ).
